attributes.action: Negotiate the "Norway Option" with an emergency immigration brake.
attributes.additional_details: Voting to leave the EU ensures UK sovereignty.  This resolution seeks to retain free trade and passporting rights for financial services while adding an emergency brake on immigration to reduce pressure on local communities.
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to negotiate for the “Norway option” including membership of the European Economic Area and free movement of people with an emergency brake on the level of immigration to help reduce stress on local communities.
